item.title: Trying Wintersmith for blogging
item.author: peter
item.description: I’ve used WordPress, Drupal, and other platforms in past for personal blogs, and for the most part, they’ve always been overkill for what I needed the site to do. The idea of using a static site generator like Wintersmith for its the simplicity and performance sounded pretty appealing, so I’m giving it a try.
